document.full_text: the government said it would proceed with plans to force anyone wishing to buy marijuana at cafes to first obtain an official pass ' a move intended to stop tourists from buying the drug.
document.title: europe: the netherlands: government moves to restrict marijuana sales
lines_and_colors: the government said it would proceed with plans to force anyone wishing to buy marijuana at cafes to first obtain an official pass ' a move intended to stop tourists from buying the drug.
